name: Moga Source
subtitle: Official sideloading source for Moga
description: This is the official sideloading source for Moga, a reader based on MangaDex. Use this if you don't want to deal with TestFlight.

apps.name: Moga
apps.subtitle: A pretty nice manga reader if I do say so myself
apps.localizedDescription:
Moga is a manga reader app built to interface with MangaDex's vast library, with usability and gesture-based UX design at its core. You can:

- Log in to your account
- Follow/unfollow mangas
- See recently updated mangas
- Read anything from MangaDex's library (if available)
- Set language/content preferences
- And so on.

By default the app is in safe mode, but there is an nsfw-enabling mode
